scripts.clean: rm -r builds/Clock-darwin-x64/ builds/Clock-linux-x64/ builds/Clock-win32-x64/ ; echo 'cleaned build location'
scripts.build_osx: electron-packager . Clock --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out builds/ --overwrite --icon=icon.icns ; echo 'Built for OSX'
scripts.build_linux: electron-packager . Clock --platform=linux  --arch=x64 --out builds/ --overwrite --icon=icon.ico ; echo 'Built for LINUX'
scripts.build_win: electron-packager . Clock --platform=win32  --arch=x64 --out builds/ --overwrite --icon=icon.ico ; echo 'Built for WIN'
scripts.build: npm run clean ; npm run build_osx ; npm run build_linux ; npm run build_win
